post.text: As secretary of state, Hillary restored our reputation around the world and made us safer.

comment.author: Courtney
comment.text: I'm a Republican, and I'm voting for Hillary Clinton. I call upon the friend and family to vote for Hillary. In my opinion, Hillary Clinton unwavering devotion to all worlds community exemplifies strong moral fiber and character. Dear Hillary, I pray for God's guidance, wisdom and blessing for you as you lead this great nation. We're counting on You. Hillary Clinton is the next President of the United States. Hillary Clinton has impeccable record of leadership, discipline, character and trust. You have my vote and support. I will never vote for Donald Trump. Trump is an idiot,womanizer, jerk, narcissist, selfish, racist, fraud, unqualified and incompetent, Trump is a salesman. He is selling something that is even older than the business of prostitution. He is selling hate. He is selling fear. He is selling and capitalizing on ignorance which breeds hate and fear. He is selling what most ignorant people unfortunately will buy; the products of hate and fear. The prospect of Donald Trump as commander in chief will lead to national and global catastrophe. I am a Republican, I believe the greatest strength of our nation lies in the individual's right to the pursuit of life, liberty, property and happiness. Trump believe in sexually assaulting women, racism, discrimination and tyranny.
